#summary Data types used in the .m3 files.

= Introduction =

The data types used in the references are documented here.


= Details =

===Primitives===
|| CHAR || _char_ ||
|| U32  || _uint32_t_ ||
|| U16  || _uint16_t_ ||
|| I32  || _int32_t_ ||
|| I16  || _int16_t_ ||
|| U8   || _uint8_t_ ||
|| I8   || _int18_t_ ||
|| REAL || _float_ ||

===Structs===
|| MD33 || _File header_ ||
|| MODL || _Model header_ ||
|| SEQS || _Sequence_ ||
|| EVNT || _Event_ ||
|| VEC2 || _Vec2D_ ||
|| VEC3 || _Vec3D_ ||
|| VEC4 || _Vec4D_ ||
|| QUAT || _Quaternion_ ||
|| BONE || _Bone_ ||
|| ATT  || _Attachment_ ||
|| MAT  || _Material_ ||
|| LAYR || _Texture_ ||
|| BNDS || _Bounding extents_ ||
|| SDEV || _Sequence data - EVNT_ ||
|| SDMB || _Sequence data - BNDS_ ||
|| SD3V || _Sequence data - VEC3_ ||
|| SD4Q || _Sequence data - QUAT_ ||
|| SD3R || _Sequence data - REAL_ ||
|| SDFG || _Sequence data - FLAG_ ||
|| SDS6 || _Sequence data - I16_ ||
|| CAM  || _Camera_ ||
